sense.def:
To secure something
pomeni nekaj dobiti, potem ko si za tisto zelo prizadevamo;

seg.quote: I did everything possible to secure him a posting.

sense.def:
To secure a place
pomeni poskrbeti, da je neki kraj varen pred poškodovanjem ali napadom;

seg.quote: They endeavoured to secure the bridge from the threat of attack.

sense.def:
Kadar je stavba
secure
, je skrbno zaklenjena ali dobro zavarovana.

seg.quote: Try and make your house as secure as you can.

sense.def:
To secure an object
pomeni neki predmet čvrsto pritrditi na drugega.

seg.quote: A plastic box was secured to the wall by screws.

sense.def:
Predmet je
secure
, kadar je trdno na svojem mestu.

seg.quote: Check that the leads to the battery are in good condition and secure.
The chain seemed to be securely fastened.

sense.def:
Kadar je neki vpliven položaj
secure
, je oseba, ki ga zaseda, lahko prepričana, da ga ne bo izgubila.

seg.quote: The strike was securely under the union's control.

sense.def:
To feel secure
pomeni, da je človek zadovoljen in nima skrbi o življenju in prihodnosti.
